messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a common element shared by most linear scenarios?
A beginning, middle, and an end
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What will lack definition in a scenario without a beginning, middle, and end?
Definition and has the potential to become a confusing mess
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should be taken into consideration for inspiration when creating an investigator?
The investigators' backstories
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What structure is recommended for a scenario to provide definition?
A beginning, middle, and an end
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the significance of a beginning in a scenario?
A beginning sets up the whole game, hooks the players' interest, sets the tone and mood, and provides an initial source of clues and leads for investigation.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the main purpose of the middle section in a scenario?
The middle is where the investigators get to pursue information, meet non-player characters, discover clues, and begin to piece together the bigger picture.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the significance of the end in a scenario?
The end comes when the investigators have (more or less) discovered what's going on.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the consequence of lacking a beginning, middle, and end in a scenario?
A scenario without these three will lack definition and has the potential to become a confusing mess, not only for the players, but also for the Keeper.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary function of the beginning in a linear scenario?
it hooks the players’ interest, sets the tone and mood, and provides an initial source of clues and leads for investigation.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the most important part of constructing a plot in linear scenario design?
Constructing a plot is essential to good linear scenario design.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can a Keeper find inspiration for their scenario's plot?
All of these can provide great inspiration: the books you’ve read, films and TV you’ve watched, and stories you’ve been told.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a good way for a Keeper to start a Lovecraft story-based scenario?
Changing a few names and mixing up the monsters in a particular Lovecraft story is the perfect way to start.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the recommended source for inspiration for a Keeper's scenario?
Lovecraft stories
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a Keeper when players take a different path than expected?
The Keeper may be tempted to contrive something to get the story back on its intended track
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why might players feel their contribution is of little value if they follow a preordained plot?
Because they feel they are simply following a preordained story rather than creating their own
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the recommended approach for running scenarios in response to players' non-linear choices?
Running scenarios in a non-linear way
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should novice Keepers do first?
Create linear stories at first
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can happen if the players are compelled back to the Keeper's prepared plot?
They will feel that their contribution is of little value
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How should novice Keepers run scenarios as their experience and confidence grow?
Moving onto non-linear scenarios
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can happen in a non-linear adventure?
The successive points may be encountered in a different order each time the scenario is played
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of scenario is being discussed?
a non-linear scenario
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the recommended approach for novice Keepers?
create linear stories at first, moving onto non-linear scenarios as their experience and confidence grows
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can happen in a non-linear adventure?
the successive points may be encountered in a different order each time the scenario is played and various unknown endings may ultimately be reached
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of creating a sandbox?
to establish a 'geography' for the game wherein numerous interconnected or separate plots can be set for the investigators to discover
